resources.string: Who is the most Beautiful Girl in the Room?
Do you want to delete game data?\nQuestions and game settings will reset.
PRESS LONG TO DELETE OR EDIT
You can win questions by watching ads. Would you like to earn extra questions?

string-array.name: cesaretListesi
string-array.item: "Say the alphabet from the last to the first."
"Close your eyes, dance slowly with a player and guess who the player you're dancing with is by touch."
"Be a human blanket and warm one of the players."
"Dance with a mop or broom."
"The player on your left will slap you."
"Show how to date with someone."
"Shout to your neighbors: "Shut the fuck up!""
"Write "I am a fido" with a ballpoint pen on both arms."
"Send a message saying "I love you" to the last three people you messaged with on Whatsapp."
"One of the players apply lipstick on you."
"Pick someone from the room and kiss him."
"If male; put on makeup. If the girl is; remove your makeup."
"Take off your shirt and dance for 30 seconds."
"Sing your favorite song with baby voice!"
"Open the window and have someone in the street wave to you"
"Speak in a desired accent for the next 3 rounds."
"Do magic like a wizard."
"Do four somersaults in a row."
" Become someone's pet in the game for 5 minutes."
"Dance for 30 seconds in any type of music you want."
"Reshape a person's hair without any cutting and trimming."
"Move like a worm for 3 minutes."
"Pretend a baby for 3 minutes."
"Do belly dance keep pace with to the rhythm of the music."
"If you are a boy, wash a girl's make-up, if you are a girl, put make up on the boy."
"Dance for 3 minutes without music."
"Drink 3 glasses of water in a row without taking the glass out of your mouth."
"Want to take an embarrassing pose of person who said dare and share it."
"Drink 1 glass of fizzy drink / juice in one swig without out of your mouth."
"Write something on the body of a selected person from group with makeup supplies."
"Do various exercises for 5 minutes."
"Tamper the phones of everyone in the group for one minute."
"Imitate a celebrity for 3 minutes."
"Walk around the house on your hands."
"Choose someone from the group and she/he will slap to your face."
"While the game is running, turn it around an imaginary hulahop on your waist for 3 minutes."
"Write a poem consisting eight-line, two-verse on a topic that group will say."
"Go out into the street and scare the first person you see."
"Kiss someone from group chosen by the people in the game."
"Massage a friend for 5 minutes."
"Go out and tell someone funny something on the street."
"Become a slave of someone in the game for 5 minutes."
"Dance with a broom or mop."
"Cat walk like a mannequin."
"Read the alphabet from beginning to end without moving your mouth."
"Close your eyes and touch anyone in the game's face to guess who it is."
"Make up a story about the player to your right."
"Give someone a foot massage in the game."
"Bark 6 times like a dog."
"Sing a song from beginning to end."
"Dance like crazy to your favorite song."
"Wait a minute without blinking."
"Describe the worst and best person you dated."
"Walk like a opposite sex for a minute."
"Send the most brutal message you can send to your girlfriend."
"Hold hands with someone for a few tours."
"Tell something funny you know about every person in the game."
"Speak a different language for a few tours."
"Show your browser history to everyone in game."
"Make underwear research pretending to buy to someone from the game."
"Act like an old woman or an old man."
"Act like a chicken for 1 minute."
"Tie your shoes strings and try to walk backwards."
"Act like a baby until it’s your turn."
"Act like your favorite superhero."
"Move like a statue (without speaking or moving) until it's your turn."
"Meow like a cat."
"Assume it's a plane for 2 minutes and fly like a plane for 2 minutes."
"Give your phone to the person next to you. It's free to look everywhere for 5 minutes."
"Give someone your phone and she/he can text anyone she/he want."
"Be someone's pet in the next 5 minutes."
"Post a very ugly photo of your from a social media account of your choice."
"Open the texting app on your phone, close your eyes and blindly send a text to a random person."
"Brush someone's teeth."
"Sing in an annoying tone."
"False cry for 2 minutes."
"Call a random person from your phonebook, then say "I called the wrong number" and hang up."
"Act like a chicken for 1 minute."
"Share something ridiculous on Instagram, delete it after 5 minutes!"
"Tell a short, funny story about something you did today."
"Call someone and speak with a Indian accent."
"Read us your last message on Whatsapp."
"Shout for 3 seconds very loudly."
"Pretend to be drunk."
"Write and read a short love poem immediately."
"Massage the person next to you."
"Dance like a ballerina for 30 seconds"
"Give your face an ugly and disgusting look."
"Get down and act like a fish."
"Pretend a dog for a minute."
"Make up a rap song and sing."
"Turn around yourself 10 times quickly and try to walk in a straight line."
"Act like a monkey until it's your turn again."
"Try to sing an opera song for 30 seconds."
"Show us your last 5 photos from your phone gallery"
"Try to sing with water in your mouth."
"Let the person next to you draw something on your face with a pen."
"Stand on one leg for 3 minutes."
"Try to eat raw onions."
"Act like a chicken for 3 minutes."

string-array.name: dogrulukListesi
string-array.item: "When was your most embarrassed moment?"
"Why did you cry last?"
"Who did you call in the most desperate moment?"
"They tell you" choose a memory in the past and we will return you there. What is the moment you want to live again?"
"Who is the most difficult person in this room to keep a secret?"
"Talk about something you did and feel totally ashamed of"
"What's your worst habit?"
"Who was the last person you blocked on Instagram and why?"
"If you had a chance to take someone in this room as a slave, who would you be and what would you like them to do?"
"What's the biggest mistake you made in your life?"
"What was the last lie you told?"
"Tell us a story of drunkenness!"
"Which feature of the person sitting on the right side do you not like the most?"
"Have you ever stolen anything from a neighbor before?"
"What was the last thing you searched for on your phone?"
"Is it to be naked or everything you think is written on your shirt? Which one would you choose?"
"What was the last thing you dropped and ate after a long wait?"
"What would be the first thing you would do if you woke up as the opposite sex one day?"
"Have you ever pissed in the pool and pretended nothing happened?"
"Who do you think is the worst dressed person in this room?"
"Do you have an imaginary friend growing up with you?"
"Have you ever farted in an elevator?"
"With whom would you want to change your life from the people in this room?"
"What do you usually think when you sit on the toilet?"
"Have you ever tried kissing in the mirror?"
"What's your worst habit?"
"Have you ever walked in when you were in the bathroom?"
"Do you pick your nose?"
"Do you sing a song in the bathroom?"
"What would you be ashamed of if someone saw your web history?"
"Do you speak in your sleep?"
"Who is your secret crush?"
"Who do you like least in this room and why?"
"What is your dream boy/girl?"
"What is your popular song in the shower?"
"What do you dislike about me?"
"What was the last message you sent from Instagram?"
"Do you think you will marry your current girlfriend?"
"How often do you wash your underwear?"
"Have you ever farted and blamed someone else?"
"Do you lick your plate?"
"What is it that nobody knows about you?"
"What is the cartoon you watch every time again?"
"Can you wash your feet every day?"
"Do you have any stupid nicknames?"
"When was the last time you got your bed wet?"
"Which app do you use on your phone more often?"
"Have you ever pretended to be a sick person to avoid something? If you did, what was the thing you avoid from?"
"What is the most food you eat in one sitting?"
"What are you most afraid of?"
"Do you dance while alone?"
"What would you do if you spent the whole day at home?"
"When was the last time you brushed your teeth?"
"Do you love your mom or dad more?"
"What was the most illegal thing you did?"
"Do you love your mom or dad more?"
"Would you change your sibling to another sibling for 1 million TL?"
"If you could marry more than one person, who would you choose?"
"Who would you marry in this room if you had to?"
"If you could only hear one song for the rest of your life, what would it be?"
"Who do you think could be the worst person in this room?"
"If you had a chance to be born again, in what period would you like to live?"
"If you could go back and erase something you've said or done, what would it be?"
"Has your darling ever embarrassed you?"
"What is the longest time you spent in the bathroom?"
"What is the craziest picture you've taken at school?"
"Have you ever cried because you miss your family?"
"Have you ever posted something you regret on social media?"
"What is your biggest fear?"
"Will you toilet in the shower?"
"Have you left anyone?"
"Have you ever cheated on your darling?"
"What's the most childish thing you still do?"
"Have you ever stolen a book from a library?"
"What are 10 things you bought but never used?"
"What was the most embarrassing moment of your life?"
"Have you been despised by anyone? On what subject have you been despised?"
"Can you describe the strangest dream you've ever had?"
"With whom would you like to change your life for a week with this group?"
"Which feature would you give the most compliment to?"
"What is it that you would never do even if someone offers you to be the richest person in the world?"
"Who do you think is the person in this group who will be the worst lover?"
"What is your attribute or characteristic you want to change?"
"Have you ever fallen in love with your darling's friend?"
"What do you think your darling thinks about marriage?"
"What was the craziest thing that happened in a shopping center?"
"What was the roughest thing you've done in your life?"
"What was the worst gossip subject you said or told your friend?"
"What was the most disgusting joke you ever made to someone?"
"What was the craziest thing you've done to be influenced by someone else?"
"What was the last thing you searched for on Google?"
"Have you ever tasted slime before?"
"Do you snore while sleeping?"
"Who do you think is the worst dressed person in this room?"
"Have you fallen in love with someone at least 10 years older than yourself?"
"What was the most embarrassing situation you were a part of?"
"Have you ever accidentally hit a wall or a tree?"
"How old would you be dating someone?"
"Have you ever pee one's pants?
"What was your most embarrassed moment in public?"
"Have you ever slept with a toy animal?"
"Have you ever had a drooling mouth in your sleep?"
"Do you speak in your sleep?"
"Who is the person you are secretly interested in?"
"Who is your least favorite person in this game?"
"Can you describe your dream man/woman?"
"Can you sing a song you sang in the shower?"
"How would you rate your appearance between 1 and 10?"
"What are the things you dislike about me?"
"What is your favorite song that you secretly sing?"
"What was the last message you sent to someone of the opposite sex?"
"You will save people from a burning building, but someone in this game has to stay in the building, who would you choose?"
"Have you ever accidentally revealed a friend's secret?"
"How often do you change your underwear?"
"Have you ever farted someone else even though you gasped?"
"If you were allowed to marry more than one person, who would you choose to marry?"
"Who is the person in this game that you believe is the worst person you know?"
"What year would you like to be born if you had a chance to be born again?"
"If you could go back in time to delete something you said or done, what would it be?"
"Has your boyfriend/girlfriend ever embarrassed you?"
"What would you do if you were suddenly invisible?"
"Have you caught anyone secretly stalking?"
"What is your favorite drink?"
"What would you do if someone who has not seen you for a long time waved at you?"
"What's the most annoying school picture?"
"Have you ever cried because you miss your family so much?"
"Have you ever been caught confusing your nose?"
"What is your biggest fear that is unreal?"
"What is the scariest movie you have ever seen?"
"Have you ever throat someone out of anger?"
"Have you done something that really made you proud?"
"The world will disappear next week; you can do whatever you want, what would you do?"
"Which salad sauce can you drink directly?"
"What's the most childish thing you've ever done?"
"How long will you go on chasing the man/woman of your dreams?"
"When was the time you were most embarrassed in front of the person you fell in love with?"
"Who is someone you claim to love but don't really love?"
"Do you have a silly nickname?"
"When was the last time you got your bed wet?"
"Which application do you spend the most time with on your phone?"
"What is the most painful experience of your life?"
"What's the cruelest thing you've ever told someone?"
"Have you ever had a bubble bath?"
" How many times do you take selfies a day?"
"If you had a chance to meet the person you fell in love with in high school today, would you meet?"
"What are you doing to look more attractive?"
"Can you tell me when was the last time you brushed your teeth?"
"How long did you use an outfit?"
"Is there anything you like since childhood?"
"Do you like hanging out with your family?"
"Do you prefer to go to bed late or go to bed early?"
"Have you ever stolen anything?"
"What's the worst relationship you've ever had?"
"Have you ever fallen in love with a friend's girlfriend?"
"If you had to date someone from your school, who would that be?"
"How many people have you flirted with so far?"
"Are you flirting with someone right now?"
"Have you ever looked in the mirror and admired yourself?"
"If you had the opportunity to marry any celebrity, who would it be?"
"What is the most embarrassing thing you've done or said in front of a loved one?"
"Who is the famous name you admire?"
"If you could change something about your body, what would it be?"
"Who are you most jealous of?"
"Who do you hate the most?"
"If you were stranded on a deserted island, who would you like to be with?"
"Have you ever been abandoned?"
"Curly hair or straight hair?"
"Would you date with someone shorter than you?"
"Who would you follow closely if you were invisible?"
"Who would you like to date with the people here?"
"Have you ever been in love?"
"Blondes or brunettes?"
"If your family hates your girlfriend / boyfriend, would you leave him?"
"Have you ever been rejected by someone before?"
"Have you ever lied to your darling?"
"Have you ever cheated on your darling?"
"Have you ever lied about your age?"
"If a girl / guy you don't like fell in love with you, what would your behavior be like?"
"What's the stupidest thing you've done in front of a crowd you don't know?"
"What would you want to do if you were invisible for an hour?"
"Have you ever been humiliated by anyone else?"
"Have you ever been revenged on someone who did wrong to you?"
"What are the top 10 products you have never used?"
"What would it be if you chose a swearing for the rest of your life?"
"If you thought that everyone in the room is a meal, who would be what food?"
"If you wanted to marry someone in this room, who would it be?"
"What's the stupidest thing you've done to be known?"
"Which relationship do you choose; steady, calm or crazy?"
"How many days at most did you spend without a shower?"
"If you had someone you could communicate with for the rest of your life just by texting, who would that be?"
"What is the food you will never eat on your first date?"
"Who is the person you do not want to see but you have to see?"
"If you could live in someone else's body, who would you choose?"
"What is the food you would never order in a restaurant?"
"What is the most useless information you know?"
"What is the thing you learned at school and say I wish forget?"
"Do you prefer to use shampoo as a soap or to use soap as a shampoo?"
"What would you choose if you had only one vow for the rest of your life?"
"Do you prefer to eat dog food or cat food?"
"If you had nine lives, what would you try to do now that you couldn't?"
"Have you ever pretended to like a gift even though you didn't like it at all?"
"Do you prefer not to take a shower for a month or to eat the same food every day for a month?"
"Have you ever shared your friend's secret with anyone else?"
"Have you ever ignored a friend's message?"
"Have you ever lied to your best friend?"
"Have you ever thought of giving up your friend for a boy/girl?"
"If you could go on holiday with someone, who would you go with?"
"How would you define your best friend, if it was asked?"
"If you could change one part of physical appearance of your best friend, what would you change? "
"Have you ever leaked a secret someone told you then regretted it?"
"What is the most annoying thing with your best friend?"
"With whom you would like to see your best friend to go to a date with?"
"Have you ever broke up with someone because your best friend asked you to?"
"If you were to marry someone in this room, who would it be?"
"If you were to remove 5 person on your Instagram, Who would they be? Names required."
"What is the worst thing someone said to you behind your back?"
"Have you ever fallen in love with your teacher? If yes, who was it?"
"Have you ever been attracted to someone in your own gender?"
"Have you ever tried to make your friend end their relationship?"
"Have yoou ever been with your best friend’s ex-lover?"
"Have you ever mistreated an animal?"
"Have you ever spread a misleading word about someone?"
"Describe a moment in which you were ruthless!"
"What is the worst habit of yours?"
"If you knew that you wouldn’t be charged of murder, who would you kill?"
"If you had one wish, what would it be ?"
"Has there ever been a moment in which you felt stupid?"
"Tell something your parents don’t know about !"
"Have you ever spread a gossip ?"
"What percentage do you look like to the person you reflect on your Instagram profile?"
"What is something that you have borrowed but never gave it back?"
"Is there anything you did to get more likes on instagram but you wouldn’t normally do?"
"Have you ever been with someone even though you knew he/she had boyfriend/girlfriend?"
"Is there anything you regret doing/saying to someone?"
"How often do you pay a visit to your ex’s social media profile?"
"What is your biggest insecurity?"
"Did you deliberately start a fight? Why?"
"What was the most embarrassing thing you have done when you were drunk?"
"Confess something!"
"Have you ever psychologically tortured someone?"
"Who do you stalk most on social media?"
"(Pointing someone in the room) Tell one good thing and one bad thing about them!"
"What is the most flirting thing you have ever done?"
"How many times do you check yourself in the mirror before going to a date?"
"Who do you think is the most entertaining person in here?"
"When was the last time you cried?"
"Have you ever shed crocodile tears?"
"Have you ever been badly rejected by someone? How?"
"What is the thing that makes you annoyed after all these years?"
"Who is the person you stalk on social media?"
"What is the most embarrassing thing you have sent to a wrong person?"
"Do you have any superstitions?"
"Is there anyone you fall in love with but you are afraid to talk to?"
"What is the first thing comes to your mind when you look at him/her (pointing someone in the room)?"
"Have you ever sell out one of your friend?"
" What lie are you most afraid of if they put you in a lie detector?"
" Have you ever exposed someone’s secret?"
"Tell us a lie you have told to your best friend!"
"If you knew your best friend’s girlfriend was cheating on him, what would you do?"
"What would you do if your best friend told you that he has fallen in love with your girlfriend? ?"
"Tell us an embarrassing moment you wish to forget !"
"Who would be the last person you’d seek help in this room, if your car had been brokedown? Why ?"
"Tell us a meal that you won’t eat!"
"Tell us something you wish you have never seen it."
"Would you date someone that is shorter than you ?"
"Have you ever been embarrassed by someone? How ?"
"Who is the person you hate most ?"
"How many children would you want to have ?"
"Is there aynone in your workplace/school that you wish you were at their place ?"
"Who is the person you envy the most ?"
"If you wanted to do plastic surgery somewhere in your body, where would it be ?"
"Who is the famous person you had fallen love with ?"
"Who was the person hurt you most after rejection ?"
"Who is the person you’d wish you’d never beenn with ?"
"When was the last time you pissed yourself ?"
"Have you ever had lice ?"
"Which part of your body you don’t like ?"
"How long have you gone the most without taking shower ?"
"Tell me about a moment when you were a sucker!"
"Tell me about a moment when you disgraced yourself!"
"The maximum number of selfies you took in a day?"
"Have you ever been ripped off? How?"
"What did you eat when you filled your stomach the most in one sitting?"
"Is it that you lied because I'm sick not to meet someone? Give a name!"
"What was the most irritating nickname for you?"
"What was the last thing that made you embarrassed among people?"
"If the world was to end by next week, what illegal things would you do?"
"What is your biggest nonsense fear?"
"Have you ever uploaded to social media and then regretted it and deleted?"
"When did you feel the most crushed?"
"Have you ever been suddenly noticed by that person while looking at someone carefully?"
"Have you ever been cheated?"
"If you had a time machine and you could go back and delete one thing you did, what would you delete?"
"If you were born again, what year would you choose to be born?"
"Who do you think you wouldn't date in this room? Why?"
"What's the annoying thing about you?"
"Say something you don't like about me."
"Do you think he/she's (named someone in the room) a sweet person?"
"Who is your secret platonic?"
"What was the most embarrassing moment you've had outside?"
"Did you ever fall in love with any cartoon character as a kid?"
